original_title: Dialog Television has good news for cricket fans
original_body_lines: Cricket fans, rejoice! Dialog Television, Sri Lanka’s No.1 television experience has some exciting news for you. In anticipation of the upcoming cricket season, including Pakistan tour of Sri Lanka, LPL and the 2023 ODI Cricket World Cup, the Dialog television postpaid Connection Fee has been reduced from Rs. 7,990/- to an exclusive price of just Rs. 4,990/-, just so you can enjoy all the thrills of the game from the comfort of home in HD, at an affordable price!

Recognizing the passion and enthusiasm of the Lankan cricket fans, Dialog Television aims to provide a seamless viewing experience with comprehensive plans that include dedicated cricket channels. Whether you’re a die-hard follower of ODIs, T20s or Tests, Dialog Television ensures you’ll never miss a single wicket, and catch every ball.

To access this incredible offer, just visit the nearest Dialog Experience centre or place your order online on dialog.lk so you can have your Dialog Television connection delivered right to your doorstep, without any delivery fees. This offer is valid until 31st July 2023 and only until stocks last.
ADB appoints Takafumi Kadono as new Country Director for Sri Lanka
‘Get ready for the IPL – watch your favourite teams battle it out LIVE on Dialog Television and on the Dialog ViU App’
‘Cheer on our Lankan Lions with Dialog Television at no additional charge’
